casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Boris BROWN, Appellant. Motion No: 2018-533 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided June 7, 2018

Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Robert S. Dean, Esq., Center for Appellate Litigation, 120 Wall Street, 28th Floor, New York, NY 10005 assigned as **271counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
